entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'ConvertOrWidenPrimitivesEnumsAndPointersIfPossible' in NativeAOT is unnecessarily rooting 'BigInteger' (and a bunch more stuff) due to 'Convert.*' calls #101821
  • Merge nested branches into AND test #101820
  • ngen PdbWriter missing applying textSectionOffset to cold methods #101815
  • [workloads] add wbt that checks downlevel runtime versions. #101809
    9.0.0
  • SIGSEGV in Finalizer thread calling SafeX509Handle.ReleaseHandle #101804
  • Crash when pre-loading libjemalloc.so on Debian 12 #101795
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Threading.RateLimiting.RateLimiter.AcquireAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken); #101793
  • [8.0] [Installer] Failure in command: rpm2cpio netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1.0-x64.rpm | cpio -idmv #101788
  • Different behavior of HttpClient depending on OS. Digest authentication #101787
  • JIT: ARM64 `Assertion failed 'isScalableVectorSize(size)'` #101786

Closed

  • Large Memory Consumption in Docker Causing OOM #98524
  • Random malloc failures on current Debian Bookworm slim image #101722
  • Failing test - `System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.ThreadPoolMinMaxThreadsEventTest` on Linux/arm64 #95873
  • NET 8 Application crashes without a StackTrace Code: 0xc0000409 #100335
    Future
  • Test failure: baseservices/RuntimeConfiguration/TestConfigTester/TestConfigTester.dll #100217
  • Test failure GC\\Features\\HeapExpansion\\plug\\plug.cmd #93162
  • Segmentation fault on .NET 6 - Linux Ubuntu 18.04 #97467
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GC\\CollectionCountTest\\CollectionCountTest.cmd #93905
  • [arm64] JIT: Volatile.Write emits full memory barrier for floats #67254
    9.0.0
  • `ExecutionEngineException` is thrown by `Environment.FailFast` #101816
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerTest.ManagedDelay test failure #96585
  • [wasm] perf: AOT `CompileError: WebAssembly.Module(): Compiling function #116384:"System_Linq_Expressions_System_Linq_Expressions..." failed: not enough arguments on the stack for call (need 4, got 2) ` #94431
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpRequestMessageTest.HttpRequest_BodylessMethod_NoContentLength throwing FormatException #101399
  • WasmTestOnChrome-System.Runtime.Tests.WorkItemExecution fails with exit code 3221226505 #101464
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Stack overflow in linking with emcc #101467
    9.0.0
  • Long Running Test: System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteNumbers #101522
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `FillAsync` and `FillSchemaAsync` to `DataAdapter` #101704

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasi][windows] Disable the wasi-aot-library tests on windows #101827
    area-Build-mono
  • Simplify our global new/delete implementations #101826
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [cdac] Update cdac-build-tool to omit type when it is empty #101825
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove assert #101824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Pin net7.0 to 7.0.19 #101823
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • Test #101822
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move issue links from comments to the warning attributes in trimming tests. #101819
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Connection Activities in SocketsHttpHandler #101814
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler the default primary handler from HttpClientFactory #101808
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [workloads] Bump downlevel runtime produced package versions in the workload manifest #101806
    NO-MERGE, area-Workloads
  • Remove utilcodestaticnohost from superpmi #101803
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Ensure the scalar Reciprocal*Estimate APIs use AVX512 where possible #101800
    area-System.Numerics
  • Expose DOTNET_JitNoInline in Release #101798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add top-level controls for VMR to enable/disable system lbiraries #101797
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Trim instructionset name in helper #101794
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Mark swift error as busy before call definition RefPosition #101792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] SVE Cleanup: Merging SVE_AE_3A, SVE_AN_3A, SVE_EP_3A, SVE_ER_3A, SVE_ET_3A, SVE_EU_3A into SVE_AA_3A #101785
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve

Merged

  • Use the standard nothrow tag instead of our own type #101811
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [workloads] Bump to 8.0.5 #101818
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging]: Add cryptographic operation counts to prevent process crashes #101737
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.6
  • Revert Enable repackaging of NETStandard 2.1 Targeting Pack #101518 #101812
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • JIT: Implement greedy RPO-based block layout #101473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix PublishAot single warning issue for ProjectReferences #101799
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-preview4] Bump downlevel runtime produced package versions in the workload manifest #101807
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "disable optimizations for PopCount (#99796)" #101245
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Remove LSRA arm32 quirk #101791
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64: Optimize Volatile.Read/Write for floats #101359
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Track sideness of arrOp in GetCheckedBoundArithInfo #100968
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.6
  • [release/8.0-staging] Sigsegv when calling a virtual method via UnsafeAccessorAttribute #101649
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.6
  • Backport #92375 and #93082 to release/8.0-staging #101744
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] Don't run AOT smoke tests on Firefox #101802
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix Lock spin-waiting on single-proc machines #101513
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Notify the debugger of a cross-thread dependency in Lock #101501
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Removed unused sessions from SSL_CTX internal cache #101684
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix some TensorPrimitives tests failing for me locally with checked builds #101745
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Process all register kills in bulk in LSRA #101760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try to reduce cost of Async #101605
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Resolve virtual method on delegates created by compiled code #101290
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #101783
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #101784
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.31 #101776
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 8.0.6 #101779
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Optimize Guid's GreaterThan operator to use 64bit compare. #100158
    area-System.Runtime, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [Testing] Backport #92901 to release/8.0-staging #101703
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • JIT: synthesize PGO if no schema, when dynamic PGO is active #101739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Refactor some DateTime and TimeSpan formatting/parsing methods #101640
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Allow moving handler regions in fgRelocateEHRegions #101613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE] generic wrapper methods for unsafe accessors #101732
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Don't enable use-after-return checking on Apple's Clang #101781
    area-Infrastructure
  • Provide MSBuild properties to use the new libc++ configuration we plan on using in our builds #101773
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Porting `SuspendAllThreads` from the NativeAOT to CoreCLR. #101782
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Refactor AdvSimd version of DecodeFromUTF8 #101620
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add simple bitwise ops #101762
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT: Bulk copy of byrefs #101761
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Enable cross-block local assertion prop for natural loops #101763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: profiled SpanHelpers.Fill #98879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement getStaticFieldCurrentClass for NAOT #96982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Typename parsing cleanup #101767
    area-System.Reflection
  • Merge JIT/Methodical tests into the merged runners #101317
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
